patthana17.5:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ savitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati
patthana17.5:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate
patthana17.5:1.1_2: terasa. (Kusale pañca, akusale pañca, abyākate tīṇi.)
patthana17.5:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ avitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo
patthana17.5:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi
patthana17.5:3.1: Kusalaṁ avitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.5:4.1_0: Abyākataṁ avitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati
patthana17.5:4.1_1: hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
